tool_description: Processes multiple purchase transactions simultaneously for bulk point calculation and balance updates, with error handling and rollback capabilities.

transaction_batch.description: Array of transaction IDs to process in this batch

processing_mode.description: How to handle errors (fail_fast, skip_errors, rollback_on_error)

validate_first.description: Whether to validate all transactions before processing any

notification_threshold.description: Number of processed transactions after which to send progress notification

error_messages: Empty batch: transaction_batch cannot be empty.
Batch too large: Maximum batch size is 1000 transactions.
Invalid processing mode: Must be one of fail_fast, skip_errors, or rollback_on_error.
Batch processing failed: Critical error occurred during batch processing.
Validation failed: One or more transactions failed validation and validate_first is true.
usage: Provide array of transaction IDs for bulk processing. Choose appropriate processing_mode based on error handling requirements. Set validate_first to false for faster processing if transactions are pre-validated.

total_submitted.description: Number of transactions submitted for processing

failed_transactions.description: Number of transactions that failed processing

total_points_awarded.description: Total loyalty points awarded across all successful transactions

processing_duration_seconds.description: Time taken to process the entire batch

error_summary.description: Summary of errors encountered during processing
